channel.title: different on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in different on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-01
item.description: What’s a five-letter word for “acquire”? NYT buys Wordle for “low 7 figures” (2 minute read) The New York Times has announced that it will purchase Wordle for a number in the low seven figures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-22
item.description: Netflix Releases Free VR Game, Eden Unearthed, On App Lab For Oculus Quest (3 minute read) Netflix has released a VR game on App Lab for Oculus Quest for free.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-18
item.description: Amazon built an Alexa cuckoo clock and wants your help backing new projects like this one (2 minute read) Amazon’s ‘Built It’ program is a Kickstarter-like effort where customers can choose to back a product, and if there is enough support within 30 days, Amazon will build it.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-14
item.description: What to expect from Apple’s ‘Time Flies’ event: Apple Watch Series 6, a redesigned iPad Air, and more (4 minute read) Apple’s ‘Time Flies’ event will be on September 15.
